def load_file():
    p = pathlib.Path('../files')
    liste_fichier = os.listdir(p)
    n = 0
    options = []
    for i in range(len(liste_fichier)) :
        n += 1
        options.append(n)
        print(f"\t {n}.{liste_fichier[i]}")
    reponse = ""

def open_file(event = None):
    file_type = [ ( "texte" , ".txt" )]
    file_name = tk.filedialog.askopenfilename(title = "Open", filetypes = file_type)
    global current_file_path 
    current_file_path = file_name
    print(current_file_path)
    if len(file_name) < 1 :
        tk.messagebox.showwarning(title = "Ooops",message = "Please choose another file")
    text_area.delete(1.0, "end")
    with open(file_name) as file :
